title: Topic 002 Question 008
body: You are adding new sites to your company.
The reporting team needs location-based reports in Microsoft Power BI that include the subnet information of the new sites.
You need to add the information to Microsoft Teams.
options: From the Microsoft Teams admin center, add the subnets to the Network planner.
From the Microsoft Call Quality Dashboard, upload tenant data.
From the Microsoft Teams admin center, define a network topology.
From the Microsoft Teams admin center, define a network subnet.
